properties.name: multireference
properties.description: Form element for selection of multiple values out of a list of records from a content type of the same repository.
properties.parameters: [["ContentType","Value","Mandatory!","Name of the referenced content type. If you want to reference a content type from another repository you have to include the repository name, e.g. repository.contenttype."],["Type","Value","list","Note how the selection should be presented. Possible values are 'list' and 'checkbox'."],["Workspace","Value","","Specifies the workspace of the selectable records. \r\nIf you leave this option empty, current workspace gets selected."],["Order","Value","name","Specifies how the selectable records are sorted."],["Language","Value","","Specifies the language of the selectable records.\r\nIf you leave this option empty, current language gets selected."],["TimeShift","Value","0","Specifies the time shift of the selectable records."]]
properties.examples:
News = multiselection news

Product = multiselection product list live

Page = multiselection page list live english
properties.storage: The ids of the selected records are stored as a comma separated string, e.g. "4,8,2".
